00076 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 void CTxtMsgStatusRequestDlg::OnEnChangeEditMsgId()
00078 {
00079     UpdateData( TRUE );
00080     if( mMessageId != "" )
00081     {
00082         GetDlgItem( IDOK )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00083     }
00084     else
00085     {
00086         GetDlgItem( IDOK )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00087     }
00088 }    /* OnEnChangeEditMsgId() */

00090 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00094 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00095 void CTxtMsgStatusRequestDlg::OnBnClickedOk()
00096 {
00097     UpdateData( TRUE );
00098 
00099     mCom.sendTextMessageStatusRequest( MessageId( mMessageId, mCom.mClientCodepage ) );
00100 
00101     OnOK();
00102 }    /* OnBnClickedOk() */
